attributes.action: Equal inheritance tax rules unmarried couples together over 5 years as married
attributes.additional_details: It is an fair, discriminatory and unequal process that judges unmarried couples in inheritance tax but treats them as if married when it reviews care and benefits processes
attributes.background: I want equality and inclusivity for unmarried couples who have shown the same commitment to each other as married couples in terms of tax and benefits processes

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652656
